Posts.Content: May 4, 2013 02:12PM Tulip123 wrote: It sounds similar to my symptoms. I have bloody discharge when I squeeze, but also have some pain. I was able to discuss directly with radiologist, my mass is smooth, oval and no larger that 1.7cm. Pathology came back as fibroadenoma. I met with surgeon and We decided it was best to remove in my situation ( having surgery in 2 weeks). I'm also in my early 30s. I know it's hard trying to stay positive, but it doesn't sound like cancer. I was really stressed out when I saw the radiology report labeling it as bi rads 3. Maybe a papilloma?
Posts.Title: Bloody Discharge & Lump. Could it be anything but cancer? Edna123 Edna123
